description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Tuna with Warm Bean Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ fish,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Fish,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chargrilled Tuna with Warm Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g tin cannellini beans, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Cook tuna for 1-2 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking. Place onto plates and drizzle with lemon juice.
Meanwhile, in a separate pan, warm the olive oil with the garlic and lemon zest.
Add the beans and stir gently until warmed through. Remove from heat and add artichokes and red onion.
Arrange rocket leaves on serving plates and top with bean mixture.
